TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReceiveMarkupExtension

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("IReceiveMarkupExtension has been deprecated. This interface is no longer in use.")

summary.span: Provides a mechanism whereby types can declare that they can receive an expression (or another class) from a markup extension, where the output is a different property type than the target property.

span.span: Provides a mechanism whereby types can declare that they can receive an expression (or another class) from a markup extension, where the output is a different property type than the target property.

summary.span: Do not use for .NET Framework 4 implementations.

span.span: Do not use for .NET Framework 4 implementations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]，已 WPF 特定的方法，以允许将输入不同的代码路径时的任何 XAML 分析期间其中设置作为标记扩展其访问 XAML 成员的类型。In [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)], was a WPF-specific technique for permitting types to enter a different codepath whenever any of its XAML-accessible members where set as markup extensions during XAML parsing. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、 此接口已过时，并将替换为标记扩展可以如何接收服务的.NET Framework XAML 服务实现或类型可以调用标记扩展特定 setter 逻辑。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], this interface is obsolete, and is replaced with a .NET Framework XAML Services implementation for how markup extensions can receive services or types can invoke markup-extension specific setter logic. 有关[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]实现中，如果想要按标记扩展而不通过其他方式设置属性时执行特殊的处理类型类型应定义与应用特性。For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] implementations, if types want to perform special processing when setting properties by markup extension rather than by other means, types should be defined with attributes applied. 该属性指定回调，它通常定义为私有成员的类型。The attribute specifies a callback, which is typically defined as a private member of the type. 在 WPF 类的基础结构实现中，大多数情况是应用引用`ReceiveMarkupExtension`方法以前实现此接口，但现在改为使用通过回调的上下文。In infrastructure implementations of WPF classes, most cases where is applied reference a `ReceiveMarkupExtension` method that previously implemented this interface, but now instead use context through the callback.

summary.span: Provides the handling for markup extensions that provide property values.

span.span: Provides the handling for markup extensions that provide property values.
